Useage
======

Creating recipes
----------------

To analyze the emotion contained in a sentence in English,
you can use ``pymoood.anlaysis_emotion()`` function
This function analyzes the mood of sentences collected in English and 
returns emoticons that fit the situation.

.. autofunction:: pymoood.analysis_emotion 


The ``pymoood.EmotionPredictor`` class is used to predict 
the emotion of a given text and return the corresponding emoji.

.. autofunction:: pymoood.EmotionPredict
